text:
Where Ductless &
Traditional Systems Unite
Introducing the Carrier Ductless Single Zone
Hybrid Solutions
Say Hello to Hybrid
Performance & Comfort
It’s no secret that ductless
and traditional HVAC
systems each have their
own set of advantages.
So why not reap the
benefits of both?
You can with Carrier
Ductless Single Zone
Hybrid Solutions.
That’s right—the quiet operation, small footprint and
enhanced efficiency of ductless and the high performance
of traditional units. All in a single, uniquely hybrid system.
Features & Benefits
Achieve up to 20.5 Inverter compressor
SEER and 12.0 HSPF operates as a variable
(based on unit size speed system
and type)
Built-in base pan
Off-the-shelf heater
combinations, using
already-available
Carrier units Available in outdoor
unit sizes 12k-36k
Leverage patented
24V Interface Third-party thermostat
technology compatibility
Off-the-Shelf Combinations
for Enhanced Convenience
There are two hybrid options. Both connect the 38MA*R Ductless Single
Zone Outdoor Unit to a Carrier residential indoor unit via our 24 Volt Interface
technology. And they’re 100% off-the-shelf, using products you already have in
stock—so you won’t have to order, and wait for, new units and parts.
Hybrid Solution with Conventional Fan Coils
Uses electric—best in environments where high heating
capabilities aren’t required.
Outdoor Ductless 24V Interface Thermostat Multi-Family Conventional
Single Zone Fan Coils Fan Coils
Hybrid Solution with Furnace / Cased Fan Coils
Uses gas—best for colder climates where extreme heating
performance is necessary.
Outdoor Ductless 24V Interface Thermostat Furnaces Piping Adaptor Cased Coils
Single Zone Kits
